name.ja: ツイン・クールスター

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Increase this card's Level by 2 until the end of this turn. Then, if you sent a LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, this turn, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type monster in Attack Position.
